name: Modern Webmail Client - Production
description: A modern webmail client UI that imitates the usability and functionality of services like Gmail. This will be a full stack system

env.name: DATABASE_URL
env.description: Connection string for the PostgreSQL database.

env.name: ENCRYPTION_KEY
env.description: A 64-character hex string (32 bytes) used for encrypting sensitive session data. This is a critical secret and must be set.

env.name: SOCKET_PATH
env.description: Optional. Path to a UNIX socket file for production. If set, the server listens on the socket instead of a network port.

env.name: PORT
env.description: Optional. The network port to listen on if SOCKET_PATH is not set. Defaults to 3001.
